    • Uses of ModelException in asteroids.part1.facade

      Methods in asteroids.part1.facade that throw ModelException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      asteroids.model.Ship IFacade.createShip()
      Create a new ship with a default position, velocity, radius and direction.
      asteroids.model.Ship IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double orientation)
      Create a new ship with the given position, velocity, radius and orientation (in radians).
      double[] IFacade.getCollisionPosition(asteroids.model.Ship ship1, asteroids.model.Ship ship2)
      Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide.
      double IFacade.getDistanceBetween(asteroids.model.Ship ship1, asteroids.model.Ship ship2)
      Return the distance between ship1 and ship2.
      double IFacade.getShipOrientation(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the orientation of ship (in radians).
      double[] IFacade.getShipPosition(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the position of ship as an array of length 2, with the x-coordinate at index 0 and the y-coordinate at index 1.
      double IFacade.getShipRadius(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the radius of ship.
      double[] IFacade.getShipVelocity(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the velocity of ship as an array of length 2, with the velocity along the X-axis at index 0 and the velocity along the Y-axis at index 1.
      double IFacade.getTimeToCollision(asteroids.model.Ship ship1, asteroids.model.Ship ship2)
      Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide.
      void IFacade.move(asteroids.model.Ship ship, double dt)
      Update ship's position, assuming it moves dt seconds at its current velocity.
      boolean IFacade.overlap(asteroids.model.Ship ship1, asteroids.model.Ship ship2)
      Check whether ship1 and ship2 overlap.
      void IFacade.thrust(asteroids.model.Ship ship, double amount)
      Update ship's velocity based on its current velocity, its direction and the given amount.
      void IFacade.turn(asteroids.model.Ship ship, double angle)
      Update the direction of ship by adding angle (in radians) to its current direction.

    • Uses of ModelException in asteroids.part2.facade

      Methods in asteroids.part2.facade that throw ModelException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IFacade.addBulletToWorld(asteroids.model.World world, asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Add bullet to world.
      void IFacade.addShipToWorld(asteroids.model.World world, asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Add ship to world.
      asteroids.model.Bullet IFacade.createBullet(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius)
      Create a new non-null bullet with the given position, velocity and radius, The bullet is not located in a world nor loaded on a ship.
      default asteroids.model.Ship IFacade.createShip()
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. The method description (unit circle) was inconsistent with the constraints described in the assignment (minimum radius).
      default asteroids.model.Ship IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double angle)
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.createShip(double, double, double, double, double, double, double) method (which includes the mass as an additional parameter).
      asteroids.model.Ship IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double direction, double mass)
      Create a new non-null ship with the given position, velocity, radius, direction and mass.
      asteroids.model.World IFacade.createWorld(double width, double height)
      Create a new world with the given width and height.
      void IFacade.evolve(asteroids.model.World world, double dt, CollisionListener collisionListener)
      Advance world by dt seconds.
      void IFacade.fireBullet(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      ship fires a bullet.
      double IFacade.getBulletMass(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Return the mass of bullet.
      double[] IFacade.getBulletPosition(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Return the position of ship as an array containing the x-coordinate, followed by the y-coordinate.

      Return the radius of bullet.

      Return the ship that fired bullet.
      double[] IFacade.getBulletVelocity(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Return the velocity of ship as an array containing the velocity along the X-axis, followed by the velocity along the Y-axis.
      asteroids.model.World IFacade.getBulletWorld(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Return the world in which bullet is positioned.
      java.util.Set<? extends java.lang.Object> IFacade.getEntities(asteroids.model.World world)

      Return the entity at the given position in the given world.
      int IFacade.getNbBulletsOnShip(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the number of bullets loaded on ship.
      double[] IFacade.getPositionCollisionBoundary(java.lang.Object object)
      Return the first position at which the given entity will collide with the boundaries of its world.
      double[] IFacade.getPositionCollisionEntity(java.lang.Object entity1, java.lang.Object entity2)
      Return the first position at which the first entity will collide with the second entity.
      double[] IFacade.getPositionNextCollision(asteroids.model.World world)
      Return the position of the first boundary collision or entity collision that will take place in the given world.
      double IFacade.getShipAcceleration(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the acceleration of ship.
      double IFacade.getShipMass(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the total mass of ship (i.e., including bullets loaded onto the ship).
      asteroids.model.World IFacade.getShipWorld(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return the world of ship.
      double IFacade.getTimeCollisionBoundary(java.lang.Object object)
      Return the shortest time in which the given entity will collide with the boundaries of its world.
      double IFacade.getTimeCollisionEntity(java.lang.Object entity1, java.lang.Object entity2)
      Return the shortest time in which the first entity will collide with the second entity.
      double IFacade.getTimeNextCollision(asteroids.model.World world)
      Return the time that must pass before a boundary collision or an entity collision will take place in the given world.
      java.util.Set<? extends asteroids.model.Bullet> IFacade.getWorldBullets(asteroids.model.World world)
      Return all bullets located in world.
      java.util.Set<? extends asteroids.model.Ship> IFacade.getWorldShips(asteroids.model.World world)
      Return all ships located within world.
      double[] IFacade.getWorldSize(asteroids.model.World world)
      Return the size of world as an array containing the width, followed by the height.
      boolean IFacade.isShipThrusterActive(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Return whether ship's thruster is active.
      boolean IFacade.isTerminatedBullet(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Check whether bullet is terminated.
      boolean IFacade.isTerminatedShip(asteroids.model.Ship ship)

      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) method.

      Remove ship from world.
      void IFacade.setThrusterActive(asteroids.model.Ship ship, boolean active)
      Enables or disables ship's thruster depending on the value of the parameter active.
      void IFacade.terminateBullet(asteroids.model.Bullet bullet)
      Terminate bullet.
      void IFacade.terminateShip(asteroids.model.Ship ship)
      Terminate ship.
      void IFacade.terminateWorld(asteroids.model.World world)
      Terminate world.
      default void IFacade.thrust(asteroids.model.Ship ship, double amount)
      Deprecated. 
      Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the combination of IFacade.setThrusterActive(Ship, boolean) and IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) methods.
